body.p:
Stanton May 6th 1863
Jas F Robinson
Governor of the Com,, of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky

Dr Sir the 4th District in Powell County has Failed to hold an Election to Elect Magistrate and Constable and that being the Case I Supose it is my duty as County Judge of Said County to Recommend Sa two Suitable Persons to fill the office of Magistrate untill the next Election or untill the August Election I therefore Recommend to youre El Excelency Richard S. Hariman and Henry S Berringfield as Suitable Persons to fill Said office in Said District and Respectfully ask your Excelency to commission them as Such

Yours Most Respectfully
Jas B Hardwick J P C C

Powell Co
Justices recommended by County Judge to fill Vacancy
Make appointments as recommended
